moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: How Sweet!
moves.effect: Sharply raises an ally’s Attack and Sp. Atk. Makes an ally gradually heal itself.

syncMove.name: Whipped Cream Fairy Beam
syncMove.description: The more the target’s stats have been lowered, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Ripple Effect 4
passives.description: When a move used by the Pokémon lowers an opponent’s stat, has a good chance of lowering the same stat for all opposing sync pairs.

passives.name: Power Loving
passives.description: The more the target’s stats have been lowered, the more it powers up moves.

passives.name: Team Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents all allied sync pairs from falling asleep.

grid.bonus: Dazzling Gleam:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.

Dazzling Gleam:Eagle Eye 1- Has a small chance of raising the user’s critical-hit rate when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
Dazzling Gleam:Mind Swell 2- Has a moderate chance of raising the user’s Sp. Atk when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
Charm:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.

How Sweet!:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
How Sweet!:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Dauntless- Sp. Atk cannot be lowered.
First Aid 4- Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
Toughen Up 3- Has a moderately good chance of raising the user’s Defense when the user is hit by an attack move.
Revenge Boost 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
Healthy Healing- Makes the user gradually heal itself if its HP is full when it enters a battle.
Power Posture- The more the target’s Attack has been lowered, the more it powers up moves.
Impose 1- Lowers the evasiveness of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.
